message.body: Love you. Let's see each other soon!
Love you too! And yes, I wanna see you. Back on the sobriety bench. Just had an amazing conversation with my grandma in arizona. We've started a project of
Sending letters and projects to each other - in my next letter I'm sharing the poem written by tim otte, an essay I wrote to monic yunus, and your essay about
Art. Yeah yeah yeah!!! How are u?

Still unemployed and despairing....! So frustrating when I'm doing something job related every day. It's messing with my self worth. But schools good, Tim's ok- he had to get his car fixed so he might be able to afford a visit which is really upsetting. Day by day right now.
Hang in there missy - I know the self worth thing can be messy. I noticed when I've been writing to my gma and prof from ocu, the time to do projects just for
Personal reasons does me good - it might not be as impactful for u because I know u get a lot of creative energy from school already. I'm probably available to
Chat later tonight if u want to. Love you love you love you
Hahaha!!! Hey sorry I never called u! I took a nap and now I have a guest spending the night, Amanda, just moved here tonight. I don't have plans tomorrow
Night - can we play catch up then?
Oh no worries, I've been busy with stuff today. Tomorrow would work probably - Mel has a guest but I can sneak away
Next time I'll kill you -A. ( pretty little liars)
Guess what happens when people stop being polite and start being real (that popular reality show from the 90s)
